# my-text-area



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | The value of the textarea. | `string` | `''`    |


## Events

| Event      | Description                                                                | Type                                     |
| ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `myBlur`   | Emitted when the input loses focus.                                        | `CustomEvent<FocusEvent>`                |
| `myChange` | The `myChange` event is fired when the user modifies the textarea's value. | `CustomEvent<TextareaChangeEventDetail>` |
| `myFocus`  | Emitted when the input has focus.                                          | `CustomEvent<FocusEvent>`                |
| `myInput`  | The `myInput` event is fired when the user modifies the textarea's value.  | `CustomEvent<TextareaInputEventDetail>`  |
